page.title: 13CHALK FARM, WILLINGDON
page.content: I nearly overslept this morning .I forgot to set my alarm clock .By the time I was dressed Daddy was outside getting ready to milk the goats.I found a biscuit and quickly pulled on my boots. I helped Daddy with the milking and then put the churn in the water bath to cool.At 8.00 a.m. we came in for breakfast and Mummy was already cooking bacon and egg.As we finished eating, the postman dropped the letters through the front door.Soon John arrived.He helps Daddy on Saturdays. While Daddy put the milk into cartons I put the clips on.My brother had a ride in the Landrover with John to the top of the hill to check the cattle.We have forty cattle grazing in the pasture up on the Downs.They are all about twelve months old.
